# Invitation to Qualify: Electrical Feed Perimeter Security Lighting Complex, Springhill Institution
## Reference Number: WS3734452644-Doc3735581875
### Description
This procurement notice is an invitation to qualify for the Electrical Feed Perimeter Security Lighting Complex, Springhill Institution project. The scope of work includes the supply and installation of the complete electrical, structural, and civil systems for security lighting at the Springhill Institution medium correctional facility.

### Important Deadlines
- Publication Date: November 9, 2022
- Tender Closing Date: November 25, 2022, 14:00 EST
- Late bids will not be considered.

### Contracting Entity
The contracting party is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) represented by the Ministry of Public Service and Procurement Canada (SPAC).

### Procurement Method
This procurement is a competitive selective tendering (CST) process, where the lowest price will be the primary criterion for selection.

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Geographical Scope
The project is located in Nova Scotia, Canada.

### Contact Information
To submit an application, please contact Sonia Stockman, Sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Additional Documents
Please refer to the Ariba Discovery posting for additional information, including the bid submission document and bidding instructions.
